author: jpeacock
msg: Make many functions added since version 1.0 in the Client API visible
to users of the Perl bindings. They are already swig-wrapped, just not
(POD Documentation): Added entries documenting dump_fs2 and load_fs2.

author: glasser
msg: * CHANGES: Update with current status of 1.4.x branch.

author: hwright
msg: JavaHL: Remove redundant docstrings in implementors of the SVNClientInterface.
When a class implements an interface, Javadoc automagically inherits the
description, @returns, @param, and @throws tags from the interface so, we do
not need to duplicate that bit of data in the derived classes.  This commit
This also deprecates old versions of methods, with the recommendation that
comsumers use the latest API.  These methods continue to function, of course.
Remove and update docstrings as described above.

author: glasser
msg: Heed the --config-dir option when it is passed to svnsync.

author: glasser
msg: When producing unidiffs, don't translate output required by patch(1).
Simple fix for user-reported problem (in issue 2906).
r26018 includes a change to diff_memory.c which doesn't exist in 1.4.x,
but that can be safely ignored.
